name: Monkey on Bike GO BRRRR
description:
THIS IS JUST A PROTOTYPE MADE IN 6 DAYS!!!

My intention with this prototype is to get very early feedback, if the game mechanic with driving on a bike & shooting at the same time is fun or (even) playable.

Please share your opinion about this prototype in the comments!!! ^^

NO MUSIC OR SFX YET! Sorry for that xD
